product_name: Sierra Designs Emissary Parka - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're venturing out to stroll along a windy beach or down to the corner store for coffee, the Sierra Designs Emissary parka keeps the elements at bay while you enjoy your day. Nylon fabric with waterproof, breathable coating blocks wind and rain so you stay dry even in wet weather. Fully taped seams keep rain from leaking in. Polyester taffeta lining is soft and slides easily over other fabrics. 4 exterior flap pockets; interior zip pocket; attached adjustable hood; adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs. Sierra Designs Emissary parka features an internal waist drawcord, allowing a close, fitted look. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're venturing out to stroll along a windy beach or down to the corner store for coffee, the Sierra Designs Emissary parka keeps the elements at bay while you enjoy your day.
